articles.title: Thomas Tuchel's 'highly provocative' behaviour instigated bust-up with Antonio Conte, rules the FA - Daily Mail
articles.description: Tuchel and Tottenham boss Antonio Conte admitted improper behaviour after their clash following the 2-2 draw at Stamford Bridge 11 days ago, which resulted in red cards for both men.
articles.content:
